title: Impact and evolution of risk factors associated with hospitalization and mortality due to COVID-19 during the six epidemic waves in Mexico
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Fernando Saldaña-Jiménez, Francisco Javier Almaguer-Martínez, Francisco Hernández-Cabrera, José Abraham Morales-Vidales, M. Valentina I. Soto-Rocha, Otoniel Walle-García
